DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to describe the cardiovascular risk profile in subjects who consume a marketed drinkable low fat fermented milk enriched with plant sterol. Investigations are lead prospectively and retrospectively among adults enrolled from general practitioners' database.
DOC.brief_title: Characteristics of Plant Sterols Consumers in France
DOC.criteria: male and female aged 1870 years, regular visits to GP (at least once every six months within the past 2 years), agreeing to a written informed consent any clinical, psychological or language problem that would prevent from completing the questionaires or communicating with GP
DOC.keyword: dairy enriched product with plant sterols
